original_text: But he answered them, “You give them something to eat.” And they said to him, “Shall we go and buy two hundred denarii worth of bread and give it to them to eat?”
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 너희가 먹을 것을 주라 하시니 여짜오되 우리가 가서 이백 데나리온의 떡을 사다 먹이리이까

sentences.original_text: You give them something to eat
Shall we go and buy two hundred denarii worth of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 가서 이백 데나리온 어치의 빵을 살까요

sentences.original_text: and give it to them to eat?
